voice.text: Beds, chairs, tables, statues and everything you could imagine for decorating your home!

parameter.value: I have beds, chairs, containers, decoration, flowers, instruments, pillows, pottery, statues, tapestries and tables.
Hiho |PLAYERNAME|! Welcome to Hammarstrom furniture store.
Have a look. Most furniture comes in handy kits. Just use them in your house to assemble the furniture. Do you want to see only a certain type of furniture?
